name: Jungle Birds Sniper
description:
Jungle Birds Sniper is #1 action addictive entertaining sniper 3d adventurous action shooting game on jungle environment. This Sniper Shooting game is full of entertainment game in which you will hunt innocent birds by using Sniper rifle gun. This game is a best practice for a birds hunter who want to kill or hunt the birds in forest. This is difficult and nerve wracking hunting game that helps you to improve your shooting skills in the forest which is full of birds.

Features:
Realistic Jungle environment.
Hunt birds by using beautiful sniper gun.
Excellent HD graphics with nice sounds and birds flying animations.
Challenging levels with adventurous environment.
Efficient gun controls
